website_summaries.verdict: Budget priced cage can accommodate most hamster breeds. Multiple levels create interest. We recommend replacing the wheel and water bottle.
pros: Large enough for two Syrian hamsters
cons: Ramp inclines too steep for smaller breeds

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: You can place the "floors" wherever you want.colorful.fun.Roomy for 1 hamster. Dislikes: flimsy metal.be gentle when putting together.roof sucks attaching it becauae it does not stay in place.ziptied.
customer_reviews.author: momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large size for my mouse and I am very happy with it. Plenty of room for all his stuff, seems very secure. Everything arrived intact and was relatively easy to assemble. We did need some pliers to open and reclose the side hooks and we bent down the center roof tabs even tho it fit securely, just for added safety. This cage will be so much easier to clean than his crittertrails with all those tubes!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Vix

customer_reviews.title: Good little home
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the medium cage, because my sons gerbils were chewing through the plastic habitat we got from pet smart. I really like this one, for the most part it was pretty easy to assemble, and allows lots of room for small critters. As far as sturdiness, I believe it too be pretty good, but be careful because it is a little Flimsy, and the front door is so easily opened I fear the Gerbiles May be able too push on it enough that it may pop open. Overall good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for dwarf hamsters!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Robo hamster continues to escape this cage no matter how many times I check the assembly. Last night she attempted to escape by pushing the top part that hooks in to the main part of the cage. Her leg got caught and was practically ripped off. Now taking her to the vet, because she is in pain. We actually had to put her down!! Do not recommend for Robo dwarf hamsters! Too many junctions and not a solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good size cage. Slippery ramp.
customer_reviews.text: I got the large size for two winter white dwarf hamsters. The size is perfect for them. Plenty of room for an extra wheels and sand bathrooms. Cage wires are not totally even but works ok. Only complain is the ramp - it is too slippery for dwarf hamsters. Luckily this is an easy fix with glue gun (see photo). Add more bumps using glue gun can help the hamsters going up and down. Overall this is a good cafe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: The bedding comes out so it’s a mess and it’s not easy to assemble my hamster got out twice. I’m not a fan on this cage... So I have had this cage for a month I have to use bread ties to keep my hamster from getting out of the top of the cage this is a pet of my seven-year-old son he cannot open the cage alone the opening is so on the functional it’s not kid friendly or adults friendly in that matter And last night when we attempted to feed our pet
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. Get a tank or something and customize it yourself. Much safer and easier
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to put together. Not stable. No space for hamster to burrow anywhere. Hard to put the “stairs/slide” on and hard for pet to use. No space to put anything inside and the colors are annoying. Wheel is hard to put on and jiggles a lot. No space to bedding anywhere except at the very bottom of the cage. Highly do not recommend. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Decent cage but not escape proof out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It took a few months but my Syrian hamster finally breached this cage's defenses. The roof is just held on with tabs, and she was able to push and unhook them and squeeze out. She climbs around and does a lot of acrobatics and convict conditioning, so this should not have surprised me. She has tried and tried to chew through the base but failed. I've had hamsters bust out of other cages in much less time so I'd say overall this is a good cage. It's a little on the small side though. The wheel it came with is way too small for a lot of hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a coworker. I was told that its so small its hard to clean. A piece of the mouse hut broke when we were assembling it because the directions weren't very clear, and I'm not sure its made all that well. The wheel had to be replaced because it makes too much noise, and the hamster was keeping everyone up at night. Turns out they just threw it away and bought a whole new set up. I was bummed that I wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee Bee

customer_reviews.title: More space than most cages, but not enough for syrians.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cage for our syrian hamster, but only kept the cage for about a week because as we did more research into syrian hamster care, we realized this was not enough floor space. The cage itself seems pretty well made and fairly escape-proof. The 3-level ramp design make it difficult to reach your hamster, especially in the corners or on the top level as the door is rather small. This might be more suitable for a dwarf hamster, but even then you would still have to replace the wheel because it is TINY. This cage does not include a water bottle or food dish, so those will also have to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS! SERIOUSLY READ THIS REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cage for over a year and until tonight it was fine. My dad heard him squealing and went to investigate only to find his paw stuck in the narrow segment next to the door. He hurt his paw and my dad's thumb was bitten. This hamster is my dad's favourite thing, so we no longer trust this cage! (the hamster is okay we are just very angry)
customer_reviews.author: Kate G

customer_reviews.title: My fluffy Syrian fits!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my Syrian hamster “fluffy” and she took only a week to learn how to use the ramps instead of climbing the walls/falling off the sides. She has only fallen off the sides after careful consideration- and NOT an accident and she wasn’t hurt. This set up can hold plenty of toys and a medium wheel. I think it is a tad overpriced based on the construction. BUT I would buy again at this price
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: good for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this (large) cage for my female syrian hamster & it’s a pretty good cage for the price. I didn’t like the cage accessories they weren’t as sturdy. the wheel was also too small but it’s a good wheel for dwarf hamsters if you have those. I’m currently looking to get better climbing cage accessories for her but this is good enough for now!
customer_reviews.author: marsxo

customer_reviews.title: but it works great for a vacation cage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cage for a travel cage for my guinea pig. It is a little small and light weight, but it works great for a vacation cage. I also used it to board her at a pet shop. It worked well for this because they charge by the length of the cage. She had enough room to move around for a week or two and it holds her food nicely. It would be great for a hamster or gerbil, but should only be used for a vacation cage for a guinea pig as it is a little small for a guinea pig to live in.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is large perfect size. Hamster out grew the critter cage starter size. This cage has plenty of space. The first night it slept in the cat dome. Only had for a few days and all seems well. Like I said, the fact that it is a large 21" cage. Lastly, I got it within a few days. Other websites (not around here) might sell it cheaper, however it could of taken awhile to get here. With amazon I had it within a few days. I think I like it better than the hamster. It is a cute cage. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing & cheap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cage only a month and my gerbil has chewed the yellow slides to the point where they can’t be used anymore. They won’t even get on the wheel in here & the bedding just goes ALL OVER MY CARPET ALONG WITH THE POOP. I’m already looking for a better cage to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying cages for over 25 yrs and this is the worst cage I have ever bought. It can’t be any cheaply made. The plastic the hamster eat through in a matter of months. And the thin wire he can pickup and escape. The white top is busted. Canon used. The hook is broken. Don’t they even ck these cages when they send them out. Horrible cage.useless!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Geremia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made cage
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am not surprise how cheaply the cage is made. It was rather hard to assemble. The front door is hard to close and open. The slides do not assemble easily. Good silent wheel. No water bottle. Too small for a hamster but for one small mouse is ok.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit tricky to assemble and the placement of the door makes it very hard to get the hamster out to clean the cage. Everything inside is made of plastic so it has pretty much all been chewed through at this point. Definitely could have been better...not bad value for the cost though.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Tutankhwadjet

customer_reviews.title: Not an appropriate cage for smaller, rodent friends
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not suitable for smaller rodents. The cage's top wiring is useless when it comes to being reliable. Our mouse friend is a little chubby, and at first glance the cage did look suitable. If your pet gets bored, the cage will definitely spark the idea of "How quickly can I pull apart these bars and get these guys to chase me?!' I hate returning items. Even more, I hate leaving bad reviews. The product would do much better if the wiring were made of tougher material!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWillBeTheDeathOfMe- Disgruntled Employee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Metal is very flimsy, and I wish I read reviews before I bought. Since metal is not sturdy at all, roof will not stay in place, so the cage dropped when I carried it by the handle. Broken plastic, one mouse dead, another is paralyzed by the looks of it. Assembly manual is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: GusLapins

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! Roomy, cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! Easy assembly, infact I did it while waiting on my husband in the truck! Sturdier than I thought it would be for a metal bar cage and quite roomy for your little fuzzy friends. I have two fancy mice and they love it. Equipped with a non squeaky wheel and a cute slide that leads up to the cutest little hide about area. I will probably be ordering another one. Bright fun colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for teddybear or larger hamsters
customer_reviews.text: This cage was so small i dont know hiw any hamster woyld have gone thru the tubes or walk on the walkways. We have a teddybear hamster which are big and that poor hamster would have gotten stuck. If you have baby mice maybe they would be comfortable otherwise dont waste your money. I returned this cage the day after i received it
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage! It's difficult to find a nice cage for Syrian (big) hamsters. I am very pleased with this one and so is my ham. It doesn't come with a water bottle and the wheel is dwarf-hamster or mouse size, so I recommend the Kaytee Comfort Wheel and the Lixit Cage Snuggler water bottle to go along with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi Suydam

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters poop a lot and this cage is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage and I am glad we purchased it. It is very easy to clean and works well for our Djungarian. The ease of cleaning is my favorite part because my 11 year old does it. And, hamsters poop like crazy. Seriously! The wheel is also extremely quiet. We actually bought a "silent wheel" but did not need to use it. The only negative is that you can't add any fun tubes. Although if you leave a small bag of sunflower seeds on top of the cage, your hamster turns into a ninja warrior and you will find him/her hanging from the top bars trying to get at the goods.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This cage is nice, not too big, not too small for our Chinese dwarf hamster. The only thing with it is, the top part, while putting it together, doesn't snap all the way together without leaving a small little gap on the sides (about the size of about 10 sheets of paper stapled together). I was afraid our hamster may climb up to the top & pushing his self through the small gap to escape. But I fixed that problem easily. I used bread twisty ties & twisted them together to close the gap. But besides that, it is a good cage & my son & I are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Broke Immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Broke within the first minute! You have to attach two metal pieces and one of the corners just plain broke. I'm a small woman and did not apply that much pressure. They should spend the extra money for a bigger box and send the thing already assembled Like the Lixit Animal Care Savic Mickey 2 Mice and Dwarf Hamster Cage, X-Large. I bought that one when this one broke and I'm sooooo glad this one broke. It's an awesome cage. I only wish I could have kept the little two eyed house, my hamster would have loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Leatham

customer_reviews.title: Not for Syrian Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: I bought your hamster cage size large, after a lot of research. It was my hamster's 2nd cage, he was about 8 months old. The cage was okay for the first month. Then my hamster climbed on the ceiling of the cage and fell on his back. He broke his back and died soon after that. I wrote the company to inform them and asked to return the cage but never received any response. Please make note to buyers that this cage should not be used for Syrian hamsters. I do not want them to have their pet die either.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P. Matteau

customer_reviews.title: The cage killed my hamster
customer_reviews.text: This morning, Christmas Eve, I went to check on my hamster and found her hanging from the bar in the cage. She climbed the outer wall and tried to stick her head through the bars and got stuck and hung herself. She is a dwarf winter white hamster. Please do not buy this product. My kids and I are distraught.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: If you have a long haired hamster, this cage is not big enough. My hamster needs space to run around and burrow, this is not enough. I will use it for transportation of my hamster but thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together however
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together however, it is a flimsy construction and if you apply any force to put it together, it will break. Not much room for anything bigger than a dwarf, robo or other small hamster. The wheel also was broken and there isn't enough room to add one of any size. But, it isn't the worse I have ever seen and it wasn't extremely expensive.
customer_reviews.author: holly M

customer_reviews.title: Your pet will escape
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this cage for a couple of weeks. My mouse escaped. Hes missing. The gaps between the bars arent very big so I thought this would work. BUT the wire caging bends easily and he was able to bend it and make his way through it. I have a small dog and live in an apartment. I'm pretty sure we wont find him and this cage caused us to lose a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Flechs

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst cage I’ve ever seen, it’s cheaply made, a little complicated trying to put it together. My child’s hamster almost escaped through the bars
customer_reviews.author: _NM

customer_reviews.title: An okay cage
customer_reviews.text: Adorable cage with a good amount of space for my hamster buddy. but unfortunately it didn’t come with a water tube, nor did it have an appropriately sized wheel for a “large” cage. Luckily I was able to use both the water tube and wheel from a cage I already had. Also, the little head was a bit too small for my hammy to use as a room which was a bummer. Overall? A pretty okay product
customer_reviews.author: Glori B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This cage is very cute and I think would be great for a hamster. However, it is not made for a mouse. Mine squeezed right through the bars!
customer_reviews.author: Tara G Kelton

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage. Our robo hamster loves it and is zipping up and down the ladders all day. Cleaning is easy because you can just take the bottom right off. Wheel works great. I did end up reversing the platforms in the cage because as designed the upper platform blocks access to reach into the cage from the top. I do not recommend using the top often however, because the wires on this cage are thin and one of the wires came loose. Either a bad weld, or just not enough surface area to weld because the wire is very thin. Not a big deal though for a robo hamster, but I hope no others break.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy K

customer_reviews.title: its flimsy and easily collapsed under the weight of a small cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for 2 gerbils, and while its a decent size, its flimsy and easily collapsed under the weight of a small cat. RIP Ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give it time before reviewing it. It was great at first, then my mouse 🐁 kept on getting out , she could literally pull the bars a part. That's how cheap this cage is made. If little mouse can bend the bars I can't imagine what a rat or a gerbil could do. So just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very good!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people didn't think this was a good cage, but honestly it's very good. It's easy to assemble, and it's sturdy. It's also a decent size compared to my last cages I had, so that's a 100+
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: When both of my cages arrived, I was mind-blown! For the price of this particular cage,it didn't compare to the quality of it. This cage exceeded all of my expectations! I was surprised at the sturdiness of the materials used. I love them and I think my hamsters are even happier with the results, plus it was super easy to put together! If anyone out there needs a new home for their little fuzzy friend, I definitely recommend getting this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Honnie Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Such junk used zip ties but still barely sturdy and it more for a small hamster or gerbil our year old hammy is too big to fit
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Brier

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Had for 5 mths and than the house broke when taking apart to clean. Loved the size but flimsy a bit. And the ladders don’t line up good from floor to floor so house can only go on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jenzra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, teeny bit too small
customer_reviews.text: This cage would be the perfect size for a dwarf hamster, but we have a syrian. It's a little too fat for the slide and house, but I honestly think this is a great way to get a good quality cage for a dwarf. I personally would like to get my hamster a rat cage instead because she is very energetic and need more cage room to run. We've been using this cage for 6 months now, and I really have no complaints other than the fact that it is a tiny bit too small for our hamster. Obviously the cage is of high quality, but I do plan on finding a new, larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: This cage is a great size, with lots of room for your hamster ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is a great size, with lots of room for your hamster to move around. Our hamster isn't too keen on walking up the yellow ramps, as they are a bit too steep and slick for him to climb. He climbs up the cage walls instead, so it isn't a huge problem. The main downside is the cage door is in an odd position making it almost impossible for us to reach our hands in and grab our hamster.
customer_reviews.author: dontomasino

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend to other hamster owners
customer_reviews.text: MY HAMSTER LOVES IT!!! She probably thinks its a mansion, so much room!! Well built and worth every penny!! I will recommend to other hamster owners. Plus, I've bought Prevue cages in the past (birds.. etc..) and there customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this cage to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is very cute and has lots of room but it is not sturdy at all. My daughter’s hamster has escaped 3 times!! He keeps going out because the metal is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: The habitat itself is great. The wheel
customer_reviews.text: The habitat itself is great. The wheel, not so much. I have a Syrian hamster who runs like a madman. I ordered a bigger wheel but it hasn't come in yet so I figured he could use it for a week. Not even 4 days into owning the wheel it cracked in half. The wheel is too small for a Syrian, even when you order the large habitat. Keep that in mind moving forward so you can replace it right away. Otherwise, I love the habitat and so does my hammy.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy

customer_reviews.title: Syrian Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after adopting two Syrian hamsters that clearly were too big for traditional hamster cages. The only concern I have is about the door. It latches well but could easily be opened with little pressure. I slip a hair clip through the wires to keep it secure. Overall perfect for me and my hammie loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly and secure
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son has had this cage since his last birthday. It’s a sturdy and secure cage. The door can be hard to open and secure until you find your way of efficiently doing it. His dwarf hamster loves the hideout and the cage looks so kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Latreal H

customer_reviews.title: A little small for a teddy bear hamster
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, and seems okay for the prince, but it's a little small for our teddy bear hamster. Not sure she can fit though the little holes, but she's a climber, so it's not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: SE Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is much better then the plastic ones at the store. It is much better for our hamster
customer_reviews.author: Cass M

customer_reviews.title: Not a redo
customer_reviews.text: This came with a chip out of the side- since we already had the hamster, we kept it. The top dome also broke in one side. The frame is not as sturdy as we hoped- doesn’t clip well. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Curreri

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to clean Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Pros: Really easy to clean Compact size, fits on dresser with other items Wheel is SUPER quiet Not too gaudy looking Cons: Top doesn't fit exactly so there is a gap that I have closed with a bag clip Difficult to catch the mice because of all the small spaces they can run Tray not deep enough, there is constantly bedding on my floor, probably better suited for one small rodent
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Elise

customer_reviews.title: Like the visibility this habitat provides
customer_reviews.text: Like the visibility this habitat provides; however, the slides are a bit too slippery for our small hamster to climb up so he doesn’t access the second and third levels.
customer_reviews.author: LoriB

customer_reviews.title: Just an ok cage
customer_reviews.text: The herbal ate the plastic parts so no more ramps and the wheel is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Turbotouch02

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cage
customer_reviews.text: This is the a terrible cage it was so hard to assemble and after two and a half weeks my fancy bear Syrian hamster bent the wiring and escaped. The wiring also felt really bendable and I’m not shocked he could squeeze through.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Baird

customer_reviews.title: Good for dwarf hamster
customer_reviews.text: Great for our dwarf hamster. Would not recommend for anything bigger. We got the medium size and she does great in there.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: But the wheel is very cheap and has already broken cause my hamster uses it every day and broke while he was using it
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Cute cage, bad for mice
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble, but the bars are too flimsy and far apart for mice. My little buddies slid right through :(
customer_reviews.author: Kris Davidson

customer_reviews.title: My pet escaped through the bars!
customer_reviews.text: I had the cage for a couple of months and then, one day, Saw my mouse on top of the cage. He was just sitting up there with some food he brought up and that is a clear indicator to me that he got out of that cage before I noticed. Use with caution and large rodents.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He did like the hut/house on the top level
customer_reviews.text: He did like the hut/house on the top level. It is a cute cage and I loved it at first but I quickly realized it didn't make sense. I have one hamster and purchased the medium sized cage. The wheel it came with was too small for him, once I bought a bigger wheel he barely had any room in the base and the wheel would hit the top ramp. The second level has an indentation like the top one so putting anything there wouldn't work. He never used the ramps, they aren't very sturdy and don't stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Syrian Hamster and it was way too small ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Syrian Hamster and it was way too small. The wheel it came with was also too small so I had to buy a separate wheel that was a really tight fit on the side of the and I had to remove the top level. Also wanted to move her bedding to the other levels and made a mess all the time. I would just buy a larger one level cage next time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T

customer_reviews.title: No instructions, but good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good size for mice or hampster. Too small for rats. Didnt come with assembly instructions but i figured it out. Worked just fine!
customer_reviews.author: D Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good little cage
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The small should not be used for anything bigger than a dwarf hamster. Its pretty good, but the levels are kind of tricky to attach and I had to put zip-ties on the top to keep it secure. Otherwise though, for the price its really good.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Solid cage. Bottle and bowl not included.
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of space for a dwarf hamster. Wheel is silent which is key. The one drawback of this cage is that you have to buy the water bottle and food bowl separately. Other than that, I think it’s the best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: not. safe.
customer_reviews.text: doesn't close correctly- ramps and platforms are sketchy. my main issue is that the ramps do not secure into the platforms, they're easily moved, the ramp doesn't even touch the platform securely, there's a gap so it's not completely resting correctly
customer_reviews.author: Murkz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Good for dwarf hamsters, mice. I have used it for my dwarf rats as well, but the wheel is too small for them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cage for the price. Very sturdy and has a lot of space. Let's just say my son and his hamster are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Aliona Tayrien

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy but seems to be good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Seems to be a decent size. I wish it had options as far as how large the wheel can be and a second house for the second or bottom level. Seems a little flimsy but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. Only buy if you plan on spending more time straightening out the wire bars than spending with your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, inexpensive hamster cage! The 3 levels offer lots of entertainment for our robodwarf hamster and the wheel is pretty quiet! It comes with pretty much everything you need except a water bottle. I also added a small house.
customer_reviews.author: SeaneRich

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not happy!!! This was the large cage and the picture shows 2 levels for climbing. It’s only 1 level. The whole reason I paid more for the large was to get 2 levels
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Easy for small rodents to escape
customer_reviews.text: Would not be good for a small rodent - some of the gaps in the cage are very large
customer_reviews.author: Amy Compton

customer_reviews.title: This cage is wonderful. There's plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: We bought the large size. The cage shape is different than the image and is flat on top. This cage is wonderful. There's plenty of room. It's easy to clean, my mice love it, and so far no escapes. Putting it together wasn't hard, but it had an issue with the lid staying on. The sides of the lid on either end open up to allow easy access into the cage. But the lid is held on by little tabs and easily comes loose if you open the side hatches. We fixed this with a pair of pliers by bending the tabs around the wire. Now we can open the top hatches and the lid stays secure.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: I'm missing two clips that hold this cage together. they were absent from the package. it's my daughters birthday. we have a ha.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hamster but no cage. It came missing pieces. Amazon replaced it quickly as they usually do. Now my daughter's teddy bear hamster has a roomy home! It's a shame he cant fit up the ramp, or in the wheel but still a great priced cage even without it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielsun

customer_reviews.title: Dissinchanted
customer_reviews.text: The wire was very thin and flimsy, plastic did not fit right. Ramps do now connect snuggly. Panda hut broke when assembling. It will do in a pinch but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for a dwarf hamster
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a dwarf hamster. Super cute and easy to assemble. Saves on space too which we needed.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Not good for mice
customer_reviews.text: Not good for mice, the thin wires are kinda flimsy and a couple joints pooped off, leaving plenty of space for the mouse to squeeze through. Luckily she was found on top of the cage before making the magical transformation from pet to pest. Probably great for hamsters and gerbils.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great price. Running wheel collects droppings and has to be cleaned by taking it out and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The cage is plenty big for a hampster. But not very easy for a child to clean. It's a little tricky breaking it down. Three stars because it's sturdy, but difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for a mouse
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect for a singular dwarf hamster, but not a mouse. My mouse found a way to escape three times before I caved and purchased a glass tank. It's simple to put together, the parts are durable, and it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Dwarf Hamster Happy Home
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cage for dwarf hamsters. They can't get out, they have room enough. It's easy to put together and easy to clean. I'm not a fan of the wheel, it's too small for my hamster and if I put it together correctly, seems a little flimsy. So what? Wheels are easy to find and cheap. Good cages are neither.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Darling

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my winter white hamsters but after putting it together I noticed the the bars was really flimsy. They can easily be pushed about and I wasn't comfortable to put any of my rodents in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: This habitat is well constructed and our little hammy seems to be happy in this home. We have a teddy bear hamster and there is plenty of room for her. The tunnel and house is the perfect size for her. We had to buy a bigger wheel though...
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Finally receive my package to open it up and see all these broken pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Great design, easy set-up. Our new dwarf hamsters have so much fun on all the levels. Had a broken tab on wheel on arrival. Emailed them and they are sending me a replacement wheel immediately.
customer_reviews.author: crosol

customer_reviews.title: it’s okay but it’s could be better
customer_reviews.text: it didn’t come with a food bowl or water bottle which i didn’t need like. the construction was a bit confusing, especially since the instructions didn’t exactly make sense. it’s pretty spacious for my one hamster which is good.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this cage. He'll happily nest in the little dome house, and it's easy to clean too - just detach the cage from the tray and the platform from the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Killed 2 hamsters in less than 20 days
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE DON'T BUY!! I put 2 different hamsters in it and they both died within 20 days of being in there. I don't know how they did it. but I threw it out and am never buying it again! I wish I could give it -5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great deal, though not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very good deal for a cage this size Hideout is adorable and quite large Suitable for dwarf hamsters Wheel is very quiet and smooth Assembly of the cage took 5-10 minutes Sturdy cage door and side clips Three ways of opening the cage Cons: Metal of the cage is quite flimsy Levels may not be the most stable Wheel is only around 5 to 6 inches A Syrian may have trouble fitting through the holes of the ramp/slide or hideout
customer_reviews.author: Feng Qin Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Cage
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult for sone of the wires to attach, but it is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thuringer

customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to take it apart my small hamster decided to climb and he kept falling and getting his leg stuck on the cage. If your hamster is a climber I suggest not getting this one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mizu

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy for Fancy Hamster
customer_reviews.text: So much junk in the stores... this was simple, sturdy and had some fun features for the kids to get pumped about. I'm happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: christysusan

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Decent size, easy to set up, no gaps in the bars so there are no escape issues, and my hamster loves the little house. I bought a larger wheel for him, but everything else works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is big an spacious and pretty. My gerbils have plenty of room to run ...
customer_reviews.text: This is big an spacious and pretty. My gerbils have plenty of room to run around and the wheel is great. They are on the wheel all the time and it is pretty quiet. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Adkins

customer_reviews.title: A+ Cage
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for my Chinese Dwarf Hamster. She loves the different levels, and the little house at the top. It's really easy to clean, and not to mention really adorable. She loves it and so do I. 🐹
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: didnt love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her hamster. The cage was large enough but it didnt seal real well so Oreo escaped. Also the hamster can not figure out the slide so she just tumbles down. I was hoping for a better quality cage.
customer_reviews.author: jlong

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it was perfect for our two Chinese dwarf hamsters and my 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because the wheel was broken when it arrived and the product was covered in black in a dust from the warehouse. Other than that it was perfect for our two Chinese dwarf hamsters and my 4 yo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra jones

customer_reviews.title: small for fat hamster
customer_reviews.text: overall, this cage is great! set up is pretty easy. unfortunately the slide and little house are too small for my Syrian to fit in comfortably, so i took them out. the cage itself is sturdy. i also replaced the wheel
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kerl

customer_reviews.title: I super love this crate for my white winter hamster
customer_reviews.text: I super love this crate for my white winter hamster! the size is perfect with lots of room for him to play. It is sturdy and a very easy assembly. Took me 2minutes to assemble. I have been having hard time choosing what cage to pick and i have no regrets choosing this one. I added some tunnels and other parts from my old hamster crate to make it more fun during playtime.
customer_reviews.author: RayBelle

product_meta.title: Prevue Pet Products SP2005BL Hamster Haven
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:SMPrevue Pet Products Small Hamster Haven in Blue SP2003BL is a spacious and fun home for your hamster. Tri-level cage provides plenty of options for healthy activity and also satisfies your pet's natural instincts to explore, hide and play above ground level. Multi-color components include two platforms, two slide ramps, one hideaway dome and one exercise wheel. Featuring two access points, this vibrantly colored hamster cage has one front door and a larger, top-opening door. Visually engaging with its bright Blue base and assorted color accessories, our Small Hamster Haven measures 14" Long, 10 1/2" Wide and 16" High with 1/2" wire spacing.
feature_bullets: Provide your pet with a safe, active and colorful haven
Satisfies your small animal's natural instincts to explore and hide
Tri-level cage features two access points
Includes platform, slide ramp, hideaway dome and exercise wheel

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
